requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows or Linux + Proton
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT / AMD HD 6850 / Intel HD Graphics 4400 or above

  • Storage: 5 GB available space
